definition: quinolone (a hydroxylated quinoline, inhibiting the replication of bacterial DNA)

sentences.english: A new method of determinations of fluoroquinolone drugs was developed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了测定氟喹诺酮类药物含量的一种新方法。

sentences.english: Conclusions There was cross-resistance of flouroquinolone agents.
sentences.chinese: 结论氟喹诺酮类抗菌药物存在交叉耐药性。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the effect of nine fluoroquinolones against mycobacteria .
sentences.chinese: 目的研究氟喹诺酮类药物抗分枝杆菌的作用。

sentences.english: Aim To explore new agents of quinolone derivatives with high activity against Gram-positive organisms.
sentences.chinese: 目的寻找新的高效抗革兰氏阳性菌的喹诺酮类药物。

sentences.english: Advances in research on drug interactions with Hypericum perforatum;
sentences.chinese: 文章综述了地高辛与喹诺酮类药物相互作用研究进展。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION Attach the highly importance to ADRs of the fluoroquinolones.
sentences.chinese: 结论应高度重视氟喹诺酮类药物的不良反应。

sentences.english: To investigate the advances in research on interaction between digoxin and Quinolones.
sentences.chinese: 文章综述了地高辛与喹诺酮类药物相互作用研究进展。

sentences.english: Aim To synthesize new fluoroquinolone analogues as antibacterial compounds.
sentences.chinese: 目的合成新型含氟喹诺酮类抗菌化合物。

sentences.english: RESULTS Three quinolones had broad antibacterial spectrum.
sentences.chinese: 结果喹诺酮药物有广谱的抗菌作用。

sentences.english: Fluoroquinolones are drugs approved for the treatment or prevention of certain bacterial infections.
sentences.chinese: 氟喹诺酮药物被批准为治疗或预防某些细菌性感染。

sentences.english: Prulifloxacin, a new prodrug of ulifloxacin, is a broad-spectrum oral fluoroquinolone antibacterial agent.
sentences.chinese: 普利沙星是新口服的氟喹诺酮类抗菌药。

sentences.english: The quinolones has been developed to the fourth generation.
sentences.chinese: 喹诺酮类药物目前已经发展到了第四代。

sentences.english: The onset of the great cause epilepsy quinolone drugs.
sentences.chinese: 导致癫痫大发作的喹诺酮类药品。

sentences.english: Streptococcus mainly lincosamide and quinolone resistance is strong.
sentences.chinese: 链球菌主要对林可酰胺类和喹诺酮类耐药性强。
